pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'tidyverse' Methods and 'ggplot2' Helpers for 'terra' Objects // Extension of the 'tidyverse' for 'SpatRaster' and 'SpatVector' objects of the 'terra' package. It includes also new 'geom_' functions that provide a convenient way of visualizing 'terra' objects with 'ggplot2'.
